Devilcat::

"All the underhanded maneuvers your leaders have pulled over the 
years, and you have the gall to talk about honor?" Devilcat sneers, 
meeting Kaiser's rush head-on with several energy bolts fired from 
his sword and another blast from his subspace cannon.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        The clarity of his thoughts return to normal in a flash.  
His speedy 
> talons deflecting the slashes, he fails to notice the kick which 
catches him 
> in the side.  He rolls with it and the blast clips is wing sending 
him into a 
> spiral.  Transforming he lands on his feet and looks back up at 
Devilcat.  
> "You are good but you have no honor."  He draws his scimitars and, 
grimacing 
> through the pain, launches himself back up at him.
